failure_description: Onboard charger fails intermittently; BMS log shows internal fault. Within 5-year EV drivetrain warranty.
HVAC blower motor intermittently fails; part is explicitly covered under comfort systems warranty (3 years).
One module shows below-threshold voltage. Vehicle under 8-year high-voltage battery warranty.
Front brake pads below wear limit; vehicle used heavily; wear-and-tear item excluded.
Rear shock leaking; vehicle used in off-road conditions; policy excludes off-road wear.
Odometer inconsistency observed; logs do not conclusively show tampering; unclear coverage.
